can i use the tool such as pkunpack or BitZipper to extract data from 
the arc file?

i tried to get the ARC files from the linux machine to a XP machine, 
and use the BitZipper to unpack it. It failed (but it works for 
other .arc files that I get from the Internet). Is there any steps 
i didn't do that cause this problem? 

is there any other ready tool that i can use to unpack the whole ARC 
file without specifying the offset number for each data in the ARC 
file?

I thought all ARC files have the same format. Am I right?
(But seems like the ARC files generated by Heritrix is different than 
others.)

Thank you!
